#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
 int gcd(int a,int b)
 {
 	if(b==0)
 	return a;
 	return gcd(b,a%b);
 }

int find_mod(string s,int a)
{
	int sz=s.size(),i;
	int sum=0;
	for(i=0;i<sz;i++)
	{
		sum=(10*sum+(s[i]-'0'));
		sum=sum%a;
	}
	return sum;
}

int main()
{
	int n,p,sum;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		p=5;
		cin>>n;
		while(n>0)
		{
		if(n&1)
		sum+=p;
		p=p*5;
		n=n>>1;
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
